user.title: Set Up Presence Based Lighting
user.description: Configure a room with presence-based automation. You'll add entities in the next step.

data_description.room_name: Friendly name for this room (e.g., 'Living Room', 'Kitchen')
data_description.presence_sensors: Binary sensors that detect occupancy in this room
data_description.off_delay: Default seconds to wait after presence clears before turning off entities (can be overridden per entity)

select_entity.title: Add Entity to Control
select_entity.description: Select an entity to control with presence automation. You've added {added} entities so far.

data_description.entity_id: Select a light, switch, fan, or other entity to control based on presence

configure_entity.title: Configure {entity_name}
configure_entity.description: Configure how {entity_name} responds to presence. Choose 'No Action' to skip an action.

data_description.presence_detected_service: Service to call when presence is detected (e.g., turn_on). Select 'No Action' to do nothing.
data_description.presence_detected_state: The state the entity should be in after the detection service is called
data_description.presence_cleared_service: Service to call when presence clears (e.g., turn_off). Select 'No Action' to do nothing.
data_description.presence_cleared_state: The state the entity should be in after the clear service is called
data_description.respect_presence_allowed: Allow per-entity presence control via toggle switch. Disable this to make entity always follow presence, ignoring the toggle (useful for always-automated entities).
data_description.disable_on_external_control: Temporarily disable presence automation when entity is manually controlled outside this automation (e.g., turned off by voice, app, or physical switch)
data_description.entity_off_delay: Override the global delay for this specific entity (leave empty to use global default)

controlled_entities.title: Add Entities to Control
controlled_entities.description: Configure entities to control with presence automation. You've added {added} entities. {remaining_defaults} remaining to configure.

data_description.entity_id: Select a light, switch, fan, or other entity to control based on presence
data_description.presence_detected_service: Service to call when presence is detected (e.g., turn_on, 'none' for no action)
data_description.presence_detected_state: The state the entity should be in after the detection service is called
data_description.presence_cleared_service: Service to call when presence clears (e.g., turn_off, 'none' for no action)
data_description.presence_cleared_state: The state the entity should be in after the clear service is called
data_description.respect_presence_allowed: Allow per-entity presence control via toggle switch. Disable this to make entity always follow presence, ignoring the toggle (useful for always-automated entities).
data_description.disable_on_external_control: Temporarily disable presence automation when entity is manually controlled outside this automation (e.g., turned off by voice, app, or physical switch)
data_description.entity_off_delay: Override the global delay for this specific entity (leave empty to use global default)

error.no_controlled_entities: You must add at least one entity to control
error.no_services_available: No compatible services found for this entity
